signals.title: UN Establishes Independent AI Scientific Panel - Guterres Warning
signals.key_fact: UN Secretary-General warns AI is 'moving at the speed of light', establishes International Scientific Panel to assess global AI transformation

signals.title: Clean Energy Drove Over 1/3 of China GDP Growth in 2025
signals.key_fact: Solar, EVs, and clean tech contributed over one-third of China's economic expansion, sector nearly doubled in value since 2022

signals.title: China Coal Rush Hits Record High in 2025 Despite Climate Deadlines
signals.key_fact: Coal development accelerated substantially in China during 2025, contradicting climate targets

signals.title: Google Gemini Surpasses 750M Monthly Active Users
signals.key_fact: Gemini AI chatbot achieves massive adoption milestone, competing against ChatGPT and Meta AI products

signals.title: Deepfake Crisis: Trust Erosion Despite Transparency Tools
signals.source: MIT Technology Review / UNICEF / UN News
signals.key_fact: Deepfakes influence beliefs even when exposed; UNICEF warns of AI-generated child abuse proliferation with inadequate legal protections

signals.title: AI Energy Infrastructure Becomes Gating Factor for Expansion
signals.key_fact: Energy becoming the primary constraint for AI expansion; AI companies investing in next-gen nuclear reactors; gas as bridge could lock in decades of infrastructure

signals.title: US Federal-State AI Regulation Collision
signals.key_fact: 38 states passed AI legislation; Colorado delays AI Act to June 2026; Trump executive order aims to limit state AI laws; fierce lobbying campaigns underway

signals.title: Bank of England Warns of Global Imbalances in Fragmented World
signals.key_fact: Andrew Bailey analyzes emerging international economic imbalances from geopolitical fragmentation; global growth slowing to 2.7%

signals.title: IEEE P7700: Safety Guidelines for Consumer Neurotechnology
signals.key_fact: IEEE developing ethical and safety standard for consumer brain-interfacing wearables lacking existing medical device regulations

signals.title: RAG Language Model Outperforms Human Experts in Science Synthesis
signals.key_fact: Open-source retrieval-augmented model (OpenScholar) outperforms expert-written answers for scientific queries and literature synthesis

signals.title: India Sovereign AI & $2.2B Carbon Capture Push
signals.key_fact: India launching sovereign LLM at AI Impact Summit Feb 2026; budget allocates $2.2B for carbon capture over 5 years

signals.title: Next-Gen Battery Breakthroughs: Sodium-Ion and AI-Predicted Cycle Life
signals.key_fact: Sodium-ion batteries gaining traction, solid-state near commercialization; ML approach predicts battery lifespan from minimal experimental data

signals.title: China Critical Minerals Dominance Weaponized
signals.key_fact: China's near-total control over critical minerals and willingness to weaponize dominance restricts global access to minerals, products, and processing technology

signals.title: 60% Americans Disapprove Tariffs; Economic Sentiment Remains Negative
signals.key_fact: 60% disapprove tariff increases; most Americans hold negative economic views consistent over 6 years; only 27% support Trump policies

signals.title: WHO $1B Emergency Appeal & US Withdrawal Impact
signals.key_fact: WHO seeks $1B for 36 global emergencies; pandemic preparedness fragile and uneven; US withdrawal notification creates governance vacuum

signals.title: Microbes Extracting Critical Metals for Clean Technology
signals.key_fact: Biotechnology startups using engineered microbes to recover nickel, copper, and rare earth elements from depleted mines

signals.title: European Sanctions Tightening on Russian Oil Trade
signals.key_fact: European nations strengthening trade restrictions targeting Russian petroleum exports

signals.title: AI Hunts for New Physics Beyond Standard Model at LHC
signals.key_fact: Unsupervised ML algorithms searching for anomalous particle collisions at LHC, potentially uncovering new physics

signals.title: Agentic AI Governance: CEO Framework for Securing AI Systems
signals.key_fact: Eight-step framework for controlling AI agents through identity management, tool access restrictions, and continuous governance

signals.title: Intel Aggressive Push into AI GPU Market Under New CEO
signals.key_fact: Intel hiring senior executive for GPU architecture, signaling direct challenge to Nvidia's AI chip dominance

signals.title: Large-Scale Quantum Simulation Platform Achieves Sub-Nanometer Precision
signals.key_fact: Novel 2D quantum dot platform enables analogue simulation of quantum materials on arbitrary lattice structures

signals.title: Clean Fuel Production Credit: IRA Tax Incentive Rules
signals.key_fact: Treasury/IRS proposes Section 45Z regulations for clean fuel production credits under Inflation Reduction Act

signals.title: AI Disrupting B2B SaaS Business Models
signals.key_fact: AI fundamentally disrupting software-as-a-service business models, threatening existing enterprise software incumbents

signals.title: Microsoft Copilot Encountering Major Operational Problems
signals.key_fact: Microsoft's flagship AI assistant product running into significant operational challenges

signals.title: RBI Governor: Financial Regulation Adapting to Digital Age
signals.key_fact: Reserve Bank of India modernizing financial supervision frameworks for digital transformation challenges

signals.title: Arctic Fire Regime Transformation from Warming
signals.key_fact: Warming temperatures altering wildfire patterns in Arctic regions; freezing rain shifting to US South

signals.title: AI Risks from Non-State Actors Emerging
signals.key_fact: Non-governmental entities pose emerging threats related to AI capabilities and deployment

signals.title: Microsoft AI Content Licensing Marketplace
signals.key_fact: Microsoft developing Publisher Content Marketplace for AI companies to license premium content with compensation structures

signals.title: T Cell Programming Atlas Enables Precision Immunotherapy
signals.key_fact: Comprehensive platform integrating transcriptional and epigenetic data enables precise engineering of T cell states for cellular immunotherapies

signals.title: Resolve AI: Two-Year-Old DevOps Startup Reaches $1B Unicorn
signals.key_fact: AI SRE startup achieves unicorn valuation through $125M Series A, demonstrating AI infrastructure investment acceleration

signals.title: Parkinson's Disease Reclassified as Somato-Cognitive Network Disorder
signals.key_fact: Substantia nigra connections reveal Parkinson's primarily affects somato-cognitive networks rather than motor-specific regions

signals.title: Atmospheric H2 Sensitivity to Climate Change Over 1100 Years
signals.key_fact: Historical analysis reveals atmospheric hydrogen sensitivity to climate change must be considered in radiative impact assessments

signals.title: EUR 750M Deep Tech Climate Investment Fund Closes
signals.key_fact: Mundi Ventures reaches initial close for largest climate and deep tech investment vehicle targeting EUR 1B

signals.title: Regulate AI Use Not Models - Policy Paradigm Shift
signals.key_fact: Policy analysis proposes regulating AI deployment contexts rather than model development, focusing at distribution and operational points

signals.title: US Workers' Capacity to Adapt to AI Job Displacement
signals.key_fact: Research evaluates American workforce readiness for labor market disruptions from AI automation

signals.title: NIH Grant Cuts & Vaccine Policy Controversy
signals.key_fact: Senate panel criticizes NIH chief disruptions to biomedical research funding under Bhattacharya leadership

signals.title: Disruptions in International Monetary Landscape
signals.key_fact: Bank of France examines structural shifts in global monetary systems and implications for financial stability

signals.title: Amazon Testing AI Tools for Film/TV Production
signals.key_fact: MGM Studios launching March beta program for generative AI supporting content creation workflows

signals.title: Antarctic Sea Ice Structural Changes Detected by Satellite
signals.key_fact: Satellite imagery reveals structural changes in Antarctic sea ice formations amid continued warming

signals.title: First Chikungunya Vaccine Shows Serious Side Effects
signals.key_fact: Initial chikungunya vaccine underperformed during major outbreak, prompting development of safer alternatives

signals.title: Young Adults Shift to Social Media as Primary News Source
signals.key_fact: Under-30s increasingly obtaining news through social media; teens using chatbots at 64% rate

signals.title: Mistral Voxtral Transcribe 2 Speech Model Release
signals.key_fact: European AI lab Mistral releases advanced speech-to-text model, expanding European AI competitiveness

signals.title: LuSEE-Night: Far-Side Lunar Radio Telescope Deployment
signals.key_fact: Firefly Aerospace deploying radio telescope to moon's far side to detect signals from cosmic Dark Ages

signals.title: Duke Energy Nuclear Facility Site Permit Application
signals.key_fact: Nuclear Regulatory Commission processing Duke Energy's site permit for new nuclear facility in North Carolina

signals.title: CIA Discontinues World Factbook Publication
signals.key_fact: CIA reflects on ending long-running World Factbook reference resource publication
